article_title: Let’s all laugh at the Weekly Standard’s lame same-sex marriage tweet
article_text:
Topics: Same-sex marriage, Twitter, Weekly Standard, News, Politics News

It’s got to be a tough week at the Weekly Standard and all, what with the Supreme Court they thought they owned deserting them on two important rulings this week.

But lost in the online media celebration was the Standard’s own silly efforts at creating a meme — a bulldozer driven by the Supremes, running over the local church, the photography studio, the Christian academy.

Then look close.

The bulldozer is also taking out something called Dom’s Deli. Here’s a guess that the joke is completely lost on them.

article_metadata.description: Hidden in their sad attempt at a right-wing meme, a joke they probably didn't intend
